mapper.select:
select userno, name, userid, nickname, gender, email, postcode, address, detailAddress, extraAddress, phone, gradeno FROM usertb
and userno = #{userno }
mapper.insert: insert into ACCESSHISTORY (ACCESSNO, USERNO, ACCESSDATE) VALUES (ACCESSHISTORY_SEQ.nextval, #{userno}, sysdate + 9/24)
mapper.select: SELECT a.USERNO, COUNT(*) AS ACCESS_COUNT, a.ACCESSDATE,a.ACCESSNO, u.NICKNAME FROM ACCESSHISTORY a LEFT OUTER JOIN USERTB u ON u.USERNO = a.USERNO GROUP BY a.ACCESSDATE, a.USERNO, u.NICKNAME, a.ACCESSNO ORDER BY a.ACCESSDATE, a.USERNO
